Articles.Content:
I bought this game two days ago. I'm a big fan of the Total War series. I could not buy it before because of financial reasons.

I just finished the prologue, now I'm going to play the campaign, playing, of course, the Romans. I do not know which clan to choose.
Cornelia, of course! House of such great and creatively names Generals Publius Cornelius, Publius Cornelius Scipio, Publious Cornelius Scipio II, and Publius Cornelius Scipio Africanus!
I have seen the game on Steam and would like to buy it but there is no use, my pc wouldn't be able to handle it. Screens that I've seen look nice though.

I have seen the game on Steam and would like to buy it but there is no use, my pc wouldn't be able to handle it. Screens that I've seen look nice though.

My computer is also not a great,(Intel core 2 Quad 2,66 Ghz 6 gb ram NVIDIA 630 gt 4 gb), but i was able to play the game, maybe some day i buy better GPU
